snippet: Don't have time to read all 121 pages of the British parliamentary report on Rupert Murdoch and News Corporation? Here's a condensed version that cuts through the prolixity.
abstract: Don't have time to read all 121 pages of the British parliamentary report on Rupert Murdoch and News Corporation? Here's a condensed version that cuts through the prolixity.

headline.main: Deconstructing Parliament's Loquacious Condemnation of News Corporation
